DC CODE ยง 3-1204.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The terms of members of a board or advisory committee, after the initial terms, shall expire on the 3rd anniversary of the date the 1st members constituting a quorum take the oath of office.
At the end of a term, a member shall continue to serve until a successor is appointed and sworn into office.
A vacancy on a board or advisory committee shall be filled in the same manner as the original appointment was made.
A member appointed to fill a vacancy shall serve only until the expiration of the term or until a successor is appointed and sworn into office.

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: General Provisions Relating to Health Occupation Boards.

heading.catch_text: Terms of members; filling of vacancies.
